mapper.update: update login_history set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, login_time = #{loginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, login_type = #{loginType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, result = #{result,jdbcType=TINYINT}, client_ip = #{clientIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_agent = #{userAgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, login_time, login_type, result, client_ip, user_agent from login_history
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM login_history WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM (SELECT lh.id, IF(user_id = @last, @row := @row + 1, @row := 1) AS rank, @last := user_id FROM login_history lh ORDER BY user_id, login_time DESC, id DESC) t WHERE rank > #{size});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM login_history WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY login_time DESC, id DESC LIMIT #{limit}
